alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 03 at 7:17PM EST until February 03 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Troup County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 815 PM EST. * At 717 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stroud to Auburn University, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hamilton, Greenville, West Point, Hogansville, Pine Mountain, Luthersville, Lone Oak, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Southern Harbor, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, Rocky Point, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Mountain Hill, Harrisonville and Hillcrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
